title: "Access temporarly restricted" when trying to start a custom game.
body:
[I got this alert](http://gyazo.com/1ca06947690eeb63af0010f41d73b786) twice when i tried to start a custom game with 9 bots. It appeared at the whentime the loading screen should have started.
My client closes and i have to log in again. But then it works normally.
Any thoughts?

replies.body: I had this as well some time ago, also when trying to start a custom. If I remember correctly, it happened in a custom consisting of only me and no bots.
When time (and the specific day) did you see this on?
